casebody.data:
WHITEHEAD
v.
SPARROW ENTERPRISE. No. 5P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 29, 2005. James L. Ward, Jr., Mount Pleasant, SC, Paul M. Platte, Columbia, SC, for Sparrow Enterprise, Inc.

*240The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2005 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of July 2005."
